title: Did CNN mention that Antiva took responsibility for the American Capitol riot?
subtitle: An overtly carved shot, complete with blatant spelling errors, was part of a broader effort to falsely link left-wing activists to Trump's next attack on the American Capitol.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2021, CNN's Cheron air show said, "Anteva has just taken responsibility for [sic] breaking capital [sic] Hill."
